titles.title: To revise the boundaries of certain John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System units in New Jersey.
To revise the boundaries of certain John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System units in New Jersey.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water, Power and Oceans.
Mr. Young (AK) moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 6400.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate, read twice.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The expanded summary of the House passed version is repeated here.)
(Sec. 1)This bill modifies certain boundaries of the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System Units located in Middlesex and Monmouth Counties, New Jersey.
